duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading a sales team to achieve revenue and growth targets by setting sales goals and monitoring team members’ achievements.
Coaching AEs on improving specific skills, industry, and capability knowledge via face-to-face and digital channels.
Serving as a key driver for setting/surpassing sales objectives and developing market strategies and presentations.
Providing accurate weekly, monthly, and quarterly forecasts.
Attracting and retaining account executives through hiring, training, coaching, appraisal, and motivation.
Participating in the sales process on key accounts and maintaining positive customer relationships.
Serving on subcommittees to build value and efficiencies for clients, prospects, and overall business.
Ensuring adoption and consistent use of sales tech stack applications (Salesforce, Salesloft, Seismic, Consensus)
